review_blob:
My personal favorite pumpkin beer after Michigan Brewing Companys Screamin Pumpkin Spiced Ale was no longer made. Dark amber colored and full of flavor. Definitely taste the spice, but could use a touch more pumpkin. Not as hoppy or bitter as most pumpkin beers. Case worthy.

For a more creamy pumpkin pie taste, add a splash of Whipped Cream Vodka.
